Module: Yt::Associations::HasViewerPercentages Deprecated

Included in:
Models::Base
Defined in:
lib/yt/associations/has_viewer_percentages.rb

Overview

Deprecated.

Provides methods to access the viewer percentage reports of a resource.

YouTube resources with viewer percentage reports are: channels and videos.

Instance Method Summary (collapse)

  • - (Object) has_viewer_percentages

    Defines one public instance methods to access the viewer percentages of a resource for a specific metric.

Instance Method Details

- (Object) has_viewer_percentages

Defines one public instance methods to access the viewer percentages of a resource for a specific metric.

Examples:

Adds viewer_percentages and viewer_percentage on Channel.

class Channel < Resource
  has_viewer_percentages
end
